data.lyric:
[ti:Talk You Out Of It]
[ar:Florida Georgia Line]
[al:Florida Georgia Line]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Talk You Out Of It - Florida Georgia Line
[00:19.33]Girl I know you had a long day
[00:22.93]You ain't feelin' them downtown lights
[00:26.56]But I got a bottle at your favorite place
[00:30.56]Just waitin' for us in a bucket on ice
[00:34.76]D**n I didn't think it'd be that easy
[00:38.10]'Cause now you're gettin' ready
[00:39.82]I'm just sittin' there watchin' TV
[00:43.33]Here you come lookin' like a grown man's dream
[00:48.12]D**n I can't believe I can't believe
[00:51.09]I talked you into slippin' down the hall baby turn it on
[00:55.63]Your playlist you play when you're in the shower
[00:59.20]Talked you into taking up my time making up your mind
[01:03.88]Switching back and forth for an hour
[01:07.05]And now you're lookin' like a line from a Vandross song
[01:12.08]I'm looking at that fine little dress you got on
[01:15.55]Don't get me wrong girl I love it
[01:18.17]Now I just wanna talk you out of it
[01:23.73]Yeah as cool as it would be
[01:27.23]Watchin' people wonder who you are
[01:31.64]Oh we should just say we did we can start with a kiss
[01:35.71]And pretend we just got back from the bar
[01:39.13]I talked you into slippin' down the hall baby turn it on
[01:43.60]Your playlist you play when you're in the shower
[01:47.19]Talked you into taking up my time making up your mind
[01:51.95]Switching back and forth for an hour
[01:55.18]And now you're lookin' like a line from a Vandross song
[02:00.00]I'm looking at that fine little dress you got on
[02:03.57]Don't get me wrong girl I love it
[02:06.03]Now I just wanna talk you out of it
[02:10.66]Yeah it's a little cold outside
[02:15.16]Music's probably way too loud
[02:18.05]To hear you laugh
[02:19.51]And there's a look in your eyes
[02:21.59]Looks like we ain't leavin' now
[02:23.95]Girl I'm so glad I'm so glad
[02:27.10]I talked you into slippin' down the hall baby turn it on
[02:31.47]Your playlist you play when you're in the shower
[02:35.19]Talked you into taking up my time making up your mind
[02:39.94]Switching back and forth for an hour
[02:43.09]And now you're lookin' like a line from a Vandross song
[02:48.05]I'm looking at that fine little dress you got on
[02:51.50]Don't get me wrong girl I love it
[02:54.11]Now I just wanna talk you out of it
data.trans:
[ti:Talk You Out Of It]
[ar:Florida Georgia Line]
[al:Florida Georgia Line]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:19.33]女孩 我知道你这一天过的很漫长
[00:22.93]市区的街灯下 你感受不到那些情绪
[00:26.56]我带了一瓶酒去你最爱的地方
[00:30.56]在一个冰桶上 等你
[00:34.76]该死的 我知道这不会很容易
[00:38.10]因为现在你已经准备好
[00:39.82]我只是坐在那儿看电视
[00:43.33]你走过来 向每个男人的梦中情人一样
[00:48.12]该死的 我无法相信
[00:51.09]我们聊着天 走进了大厅 宝贝 打开灯
[00:55.63]你淋浴时播放起了歌单
[00:59.20]我耐心与你交谈 想让你下定决心
[01:03.88]一个小时里 来回转动
[01:07.05]现在你看起来就像是Vandross歌曲里的线
[01:12.08]我看着你穿着的美丽性感的短裙
[01:15.55]女孩 不要误会 我很喜欢
[01:18.17]现在我只想无视它 与你聊天
[01:23.73]尽可能保持风度
[01:27.23]我看到人们都在惊讶你是谁
[01:31.64]我们应该 我们可以从一个亲吻开始
[01:35.71]然后假装刚从酒吧回来
[01:39.13]我们聊着天 走进了大厅 宝贝 打开灯
[01:43.60]你淋浴时播放起了歌单
[01:47.19]我耐心与你交谈 想让你下定决心
[01:51.95]一个小时里 来回转动
[01:55.18]现在你看起来就像是Vandross歌曲里的线
[02:00.00]我看着你穿着的美丽性感的短裙
[02:03.57]女孩 不要误会 我很喜欢
[02:06.03]现在我只想无视它 与你聊天
[02:10.66]外面有点冷
[02:15.16]音乐声好像太大了
[02:18.05]掩盖了你的笑声
[02:19.51]你的眼神有深意
[02:21.59]好像我们现在不是要离开
[02:23.95]女孩 我太高兴了
[02:27.10]我们聊着天 走进了大厅 宝贝 打开灯
[02:31.47]你淋浴时播放起了歌单
[02:35.19]我耐心与你交谈 想让你下定决心
[02:39.94]一个小时里 来回转动
[02:43.09]现在你看起来就像是Vandross歌曲里的线
[02:48.05]我看着你穿着的美丽性感的短裙
[02:51.50]女孩 不要误会 我很喜欢
[02:54.11]现在我只想无视它 与你聊天
